==Trivia==
* {{W|Sökmen el-Kutbî}} was a {{W|Turkmen|Turkmens}} military commander, a former slave {{W|Emir|amir}} in the service of the {{W|Seljuk Empire|Seljuks}}, who became the founder of the {{W|Shah-Armens|Shah-i Arman}} dynasty.
